speaker: thou
dialog: Father, please forbear it, forbear me, please, it hurts, forbear doing that, please forbear, I am begging thou.

speaker: father
dialog: Keep quiet, dun's the mouse! or thy mother shall hark, and thou wot what shall befall would she discovers us doing this.

speaker: thou
dialog: please father, I canst not doth this anymore, forbear doing that to me, please forbear me, please, that is all I do lack, just let hie of me and I shall ne'r say to mine mother.

speaker: father
dialog: this is the price thou might not but pay to live, thou and thy mother are bootless, thou are whoreson without me, and I ne'r let thou hie, I canst not let thou say to anyone else about this.

speaker: mother
dialog: what is happening? what is thy purpose to mine child, forbear mine child, thou fucking bastard!

speaker: father
dialog: what the fuck didst thou just call me? soft, dun's the mouse.

speaker: mother
dialog: I shall inform the authorities.

speaker: father
dialog: get back hither, I demand thee to keep hither.

speaker: mother
dialog: I canst not let thou get aroint, there is no way I let myself live knowing this befell.

speaker: father
dialog: I am demanding thee to keep quiet!

speaker: mother
dialog: calm down please, please calm down, put that aroint, we want never to try this please, our child is right 'I front of us, please put that aroint.  Ahhhhhhhh!!!

speaker: thou
dialog: mother! please, mommy, wake up, wake up mommy, please… never leave me, please mommy, I love thou, please mother, keep.

speaker: father
dialog: if thou never obey me, that shall befall thee.

speaker: thou
dialog: thou shall pay for this.

speaker: father
dialog: what is thy purpose with that thing? put that thing aroint right now!!!

speaker: narrator
dialog: the child whom hath surprised their issue was taken to the temple orphanage, all's seemed normal, till one day, a group bid XXXVI COETUS came, all's changed

speaker: narrator
dialog: As an orphan, the cult XXXVI Coetus  kidnapp'd the child, those gents did want to useth the lighteth yond cometh from the innocence of the child’s soul and off'r t to their god, hoping yond wouldst endeth the et'rnal night yond t'rments their village, and bringeth backeth the daylight and happiness.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Unf'rtunately, ev'rything wenteth h'rribly wrong, and those gents all kicked the bucket, howev'r the child did survive.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Hey, wake up!

speaker: narrator
dialog: XXXVI Coetus hath taken over here, they attempted to use this temple to manifest their god to this earth, they dispatch everyone yet thou alone remain, you stand here alone, all alone, with nobody by thy side and the only company you keep is the thoughts residing in thy mind.

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: You need to get out of here as soon as possible, so listen to me and pay close attention.

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: You need to find the keys of every door because you are going to need them, you won’t be able to discard the keys because you will need them, constantly.

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: The exit of this church is sealed by the wrath of both gods; the god from heaven and the god from hell.

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: You will need to retrieve the four crosses and use them to open the door by the altar.

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: Remember how I mentioned the gods, the god from heaven has already helped you by dropping cross by the map, however,

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: You will need to ask the other god for a favor, and for that, you must find the upside-down painting, turn off your lights and just go through it

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: You will be spawned in a different dimension, once you are there, find keys, and then you’ll get to a crypt with coffins, you will use them to contact the other god.

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: Dial the number of the beast (666); stand on a coffin, press D, wait for the bell to ring, then wait about three seconds, then go to the next coffin and repeat. If you mess up and call a higher number, it will reset back to zero.

speaker: exspiravit
dialog: And you will be able to try again. Remember, D = 500, C = 100, L = 50; X = 10; V = 5; I = 1.
